aiFirstTool.tooltip.title: AI-powered workflow creation
aiFirstTool.tooltip.description: Create and modify workflows using natural language
aiFirstTool.info: I can help you create workflows. Just describe what you want to do!
aiFirstTool.inputPlaceholder: Describe what you want to automate...

diffPreview.title: Review Workflow Changes
diffPreview.subtitle: Preview changes before applying
diffPreview.helpText: Review the changes that will be made to your workflow. You can skip individual changes if needed.

secretsWizard.title: Configure Credentials
secretsWizard.detectionNotice: Some nodes in your workflow require credentials to work properly.
secretsWizard.existingCredentialsFound: {count} credential already configured | {count} credentials already configured
secretsWizard.createInfo: You'll be guided through creating new credentials on the next step.
secretsWizard.summarySuccess: All credentials have been configured successfully!
secretsWizard.nextSteps: Your workflow is now ready to use. You can always update credentials later in the workflow settings.

subtitle.detection: {count} credential type needs configuration | {count} credential types need configuration
subtitle.selection: Select how to configure each credential
subtitle.creation: Enter details for {count} new credential | Enter details for {count} new credentials
subtitle.summary: Your workflow is ready to use
